body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     A Photographic Journey of the Trail     A Photographic Journey - Pictures 1-15     Mission Espada Aqueduct                  Mission Espada Aqueduct        Christopher Talbot       Mission Espada Aqueduct, Bexar County, Texas This National Historic Landmark shows the vital role of water in the survival of missions in the vicinity of San Antonio. According to tradition, goat’s milk served as a cementing agent in the mortar used in constructing the aqueduct.
